alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 3:23PM EST until December 15 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO NOON EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of a dusting and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of northern Delaware, southern New Jersey and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 5 AM to noon EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will begin freezing rain near daybreak, possibly mixing with snow or sleet at onset near and northwest of I-95. Temperatures will warm above freezing from mid to late morning resulting in a change to plain rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
